name: Ersatzica
description: Curious young wolf who likes to tinker. Invents things and repairs things.

name: Mudrich
description: Fun-loving young wolf whose favorite pasttime is smashing cats.

name: Wryonin
description: Responsible young wolf who looks after his siblings.

name: Lemilay
description: Bossy young wolf who believes she deserves to be next-in-line for chieftess.
species gift: Hindsight: The bald spot on her head glows, letting her see into the past.

name: Awoomoon
description: Chieftess of the Wolf Village. Mother of Ersatzica, Mudrich, Wryonin, and Lemilay.

name: Fisher
description: Chill young cat who just wants to relax.
